ARABIC: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ وَٱلنَّٰزِعَٰتِ غَرْقًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: By those who pluck out harshly,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: I CALL TO WITNESS those who dive and drag,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: By those (angels) that pluck out the soul from depths,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: By the angels who violently tear-out the souls of the disbelievers from their bodies,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: By oath of those who harshly pull out the soul. (Of the disbeliever)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: By those who pull out, drowning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: I swear by the angels who violently pull out the souls of the wicked,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: By those that pluck out vehemently
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: By those who drag forth to destruction,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: By [the winds] that pluck out vehemently
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: By the angels who drag forth vehemently.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: By those [angels] who wrest [the soul] violently,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: By the (angels) who tear out (the souls of the wicked) with violence;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: By those (angels) who pull out (the souls of the disbelievers and the wicked) with great violence;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: By the pluckers (the angels of death), violently plucking (the souls of the unbelievers),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: By those [angels] who extract with violence
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [79:1] By those that wrest, [by] the angels who wrest the souls of disbelievers, violently;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And from his narration on the authority of Ibn 'Abbas that he said concerning the interpretation of Allah's saying (By those who drag forth): '(By those who drag forth) He says: Allah swears by the angels who take away the souls of the disbelievers (to destruction) the souls of the disbelievers,
